1470237327200960514.full_text: December 13 marks China's national memorial day for the victims of the #Nanjing Massacre. #OnThisDay in 1937, Japanese troops captured the city of Nanjing. Around 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers were brutally killed in over six weeks. https://t.co/dhonzTJdQF

1470239554846158848.full_text: December 13 marks the 84th anniversary of the #NanjingMassacre and the eighth National Memorial Day for the 300,000 victims of the Nanjing Massacre. Eleven survivors of the Nanjing Massacre have passed away this year. Only 61 registered survivors of the Nanjing Massacre remain. https://t.co/hl5OOdLETz
